papers.title: Highly efficient light-emitting diodes via self-assembled InP quantum dot films
papers.abstract_snippet: Heavy-metal-free quantum dot light-emitting diodes (QLEDs) face commercialization challenges due to low efficiency and poor stability... evaporative-driven self-assembly strategy enables uniform InP-based quantum dot films achieving 26.6% external quantum efficiency.
papers.relevance_explanation_from_llm: Demonstrates advancements in environmentally friendly InP-based QLEDs through novel film fabrication methods, directly addressing quantum dot display technology challenges.

papers.title: Ultrabright and stable top-emitting quantum-dot light-emitting diodes
papers.abstract_snippet: Top-emitting QLEDs with luminance exceeding 1.6 million nits through optimized microcavity design and refractive index engineering.
papers.relevance_explanation_from_llm: Presents breakthrough performance metrics for top-emitting QLED architectures critical for next-generation display applications.
